channel.title: Tapan Babbar on Outliers
channel.description: Recent content in Tapan Babbar on Outliers

item.title: Sounds of Mumbai
item.description: Sounds of Mumbai is unique because capturing the sense of being at a place is hard. We often associate a space with just its visuals, but in reality we experience it through all our senses. Tapan has managed to accomplish it beautifully, not just in Sounds of Mumbai but also in his other projects by combining his skills in tech and his love for travel. Through audio, micro interaction animations, videos and transitions, Tapan has created an immersive experience for project viewers to feel like they are part of a cityâ€™s culture.
